home:
Tutorial: Factory View

You are currently in the Factory view. This is where you can see and manage your factory layout.

  • The Right Part shows your global factory storage. You can favorite some resources using the icon.
  • The Bottom Part list the equipment you're allowed to build. Click on one of them to start the building mode.
  • The Main Part shows your factory blueprint. You can Right Click on a piece of equipment to show details. Then you can use the icon (or M) to move the equipment, or icon (or D) to delete/sell the equipment.

Tutorial: Global Market

You are currently in the Global Market. This is where you can buy, sell and see price history.

  • The Price History graph is currently Work-In-Progress, the data aren't real. But soon, it will be affected by everyone buying and selling resources!
  • The Right Part let you manually buy and sell resources. Chose the resource, the amount, and buy/sell.
  • In the future, you will be able to set automatic buy/sell rules too!
